item.title: Trees and Distance: Basic Properties
item.description: 參考書籍: Introduction to Graph Theory - Second edition 樹基本定義 acyclic A graph with no cycle forest An acyclic graph tree A connected acyclic graph leaf A vertex of degree 1 又稱作 pendant vertex spanning subgraph A spanning subgraph of $G$ is a subgraph with vertex set $V(G)$. spanning tree A spanning tree is a spanning subgraph that is a tree.
